content: the switchable succulents will also be available as free youtube videos releasing during july 2025 on the crafteemanatee youtube channel if you are following this pattern after july 2025 you can follow along to the visual tutorials or use them as a reference along the way the switchable succulents features three different succulents that each fit into one dirt ball with a removable pot the succulents can be switched out easily and the pot can be removed to switch out the color if you want the switchable succulents are truly customizable to any combination you want **materials** ▪ 18 grams of worsted weight yarn in brown dirt ▪ 13 grams of worsted weight yarn in orange pot ▪ 22 grams of worsted weight yarn in light green echeveria ▪ 30 grams of worsted weight yarn in dark green cactus ▪ 25 grams of worsted weight yarn in bright green aloe ▪ g 4 0mm hook ▪ tapestry needle ▪ scissors ▪ stuffing **skills** ▪ basic understanding of crochet and amigurumi techniques ▪ knowledge of crocheting in the round
